org.middleheaven.domain.store
Interface StorageUnit

All Known Implementing Classes:
ArrayStorageUnit
public interface StorageUnit

A unit of storage. The interfaces established a universal contract based on the UnitOfWork pattern.

Method Summary

Method Detail

addAction

void addAction(StoreAction action)
Add an action to the unit

Parameters:
action - the action to be performed

simplify

void simplify()
Optional operation that simplifies the current actions on the ones that will really change the storage state. If, for example, an action will add a storable and anothe action will remove the same storable after simplification none of this action should be present
